errors.error_description: The README omits the command needed to run the basic usage script, leaving the user unsure how to execute the example code.
correction_candidates: Change "Run the following script:" to "Run the following via `python this_file.py --comms local --nworkers 4`:".
Add the command `python your_script_name.py --comms local --nworkers 4` after the code block.
Add a comment inside the code block: `# To run: python this_file.py --comms local --nworkers 4`.
Change "Run the following script:" to "Run the following via `python this_file.py`:`".
errors.golden_answer: Change "Run the following script:" to "Run the following via `python this_file.py --comms local --nworkers 4`:"."
